movies.title: To See the Sea
movies.plot: Tomas (12) gets a camera and begins making a film about his family. His enigmatic father () works from home. By hiding a camera in his office, Tomas discovers that on Tuesdays and Thursdays his father leaves the house. When confronted with that fact, he denies it. On the pursuit of the great family secret Tomas reveals the hidden side of Haris, his best friend, who starts using a camera as the only way to get his mum and brother away from the hell of his violent father. Courage and profound friendship lead Tomas and Haris to the final revelation and an unpredictable conclusion. The whole film is shot and edited as if by a twelve-year-old boy. This technique allows us to perceive the world through the eyes of a child.

biography.bio: Petr Simcák is an actor, known for To See the Sea (2014), The Spooks (2016) and Hlas pro rímského krále (2016).
biography.name: Petr Simcák

biography.bio: Jan Marsál is an actor, known for To See the Sea (2014), Gympl s (r)ucením omezeným (2012) and Tender Waves (2013).
biography.name: Jan Marsál

biography.bio: Ondrej Vetchy graduated at 1984 at Prague Conservatory in musical-drama department. His first achievement was the part of young devil in one of the best Czech fantasy for children ever - S certy nejsou zerty (There Are No Jokes with Devils) from the director Hynek Bocan. Ondrej Vetchy succeed like only one Czech movie actor at European Film Awards, when he was nominated for the part of cool masher Dan in drama Dum pro dva. He achieved in comedies as well as in dramas. His most popular characters are soldier Kefalin in comedy Cerni baroni (Nr. 1 hit in Czech theaters of the year), grave digger Broz in Oscar awarded movie by Jan Sverak Kolya (Czech Lion nominee, Nr. 1 hit in Czech theaters of the year), Kvido's father in Bajecna leta pod psa (Wonderful Years that Sucks, Czech Lion nominee, Nr. 1 hit in Czech theaters of the year, Award of Cinema Magazine for Best Actor), pilot in the Tmavomodry svet (Czech Lion nominee, Nr. 1 hit in Czech theaters of the year, Award of Cinema Magazine for Best Actor) and irresponsible son in Babi leto (Autumn Spring). Ondrej Vetchy is a member of very famous Czech theatre Cinoherni klub and he is also very successful in work for TV. Ondrej Vetchy belongs to the most popular Czech actors ever.
biography.name: Ondrej Vetchý

biography.bio: Lucie Trmíková was born on July 17, 1969 in Kolín, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for To See the Sea (2014), Tambylles (2012) and Ulice (2005).
biography.name: Lucie Trmíková

biography.bio: Jaroslava Pokorná is an actress, known for Boredom in Brno (2003), Sunday League - Pepik Hnatek's Final Match (2012) and To See the Sea (2014).
biography.name: Jaroslava Pokorná

biography.bio: Jan Hlavác is an actor, known for To See the Sea (2014) and Poslední sezona (2006).
biography.name: Jan Hlavác

biography.bio: Michaela Majerníková is an actress, known for The Confidant (2012), To See the Sea (2014) and Profesionali (2008).
biography.name: Michaela Majerníková

biography.bio: Ondrej Veselý was born on March 24, 1979 in Ostrava, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Vyprávej (2009), To See the Sea (2014) and Svatby v Benátkách (2014).
biography.name: Ondrej Veselý

biography.bio: Lukás Hrabák is an actor, known for Ordinace v ruzové zahrade 2 (2008), To See the Sea (2014) and Zázraky zivota (2010).
biography.name: Lukás Hrabák

biography.bio: Roman Nevecný is an actor, known for To See the Sea (2014), Ordinace v ruzové zahrade 2 (2008) and Cetníci z Luhacovic (2017).
biography.name: Roman Nevecný

biography.bio: Miroslav Táborský was born on November 9, 1959 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for The Brothers Grimm (2005), Hostel (2005) and EuroTrip (2004).
biography.name: Miroslav Táborský

biography.bio: Anastázie Chocholatá is an actress, known for Gympl s (r)ucením omezeným (2012), To See the Sea (2014) and Vyprávej (2009).
biography.name: Anastázie Chocholatá

biography.bio: Martin Hruska is an actor, known for To See the Sea (2014), Husband to Rent (2014) and ArmA 2 (2009).
biography.name: Martin Hruska

biography.bio: Ondrej Volejník is an actor, known for Ulice (2005), Baron rouge (2008) and Enfant 44 (2015).
biography.name: Ondrej Volejník

biography.bio: Dana Verzichová was born on August 23, 1977 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Ordinace v ruzové zahrade (2005), To See the Sea (2014) and Ordinace v ruzové zahrade 2 (2008).
biography.name: Dana Verzichová
